_description: This file defines the available commands in the dropdown menu. Each command can have the following properties:

_properties.command: The actual command to execute on the remote VM (required)
_properties.responses: Dictionary of response patterns for interactive commands (optional)
_properties.disconnect: Set to true if the command will disconnect/reboot (optional)
_properties.requires_extra_input: Set to true if the command needs additional user input (optional)
_properties.prompt: The prompt text to show when requires_extra_input is true (optional)
_properties.warning: Set to true if the command should show 'Are you sure?' confirmation (optional)

_usage: To add a new command, add a new entry with a unique name as the key. To modify existing commands, edit the properties. Restart the application after making changes.
_documentation: See COMMANDS.md for detailed examples and documentation.
